attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore should receive the highest honour for his walk for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: BRITISH SPIRIT IN THE FACE OF DISASTER.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has shown the true British fighting spirit in his battle against Surgery, old age , and the Corona pandemic virus. He should receive the highest civilian or military honour for his support for the NHS when good news is in short supply

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
